meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> hits a <radical>tree</radical> and your <radical>hat</radical> protects you from the <radical>water</radical>, but the hat itself is now covered in <kanji>lacquer</kanji>. You take it off and see that it's shiny and hard and protected.
readingMnemonic: You decide to scoop up the rest of the <kanji>lacquer</kanji> water and use it on your furniture to protect it from your <reading>shih tzu</reading> (しつ). Now it can't bite or scratch or ruin any of your things anymore!
